meanings.definition: The quality or state of having many leaves.
meanings.sent1: The forest's leafiness was breathtaking in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: I love the leafiness of this park during the fall season.
meanings.sent3: The leafiness of the tree made it a popular spot for birds to build their nests.
meanings.sent4: Her garden's leafiness was like a green blanket covering the ground.
meanings.sent5: The leafiness of the plant made it look vibrant and full of life.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being covered in leaves.
meanings.sent1: The leafiness of the tree provided shade on hot summer days.
meanings.sent2: The leafiness of the bushes made them perfect hiding spots for the children.
meanings.sent3: The leafiness of the forest created a magical atmosphere for the hikers.
meanings.sent4: The leafiness of the vine climbed up the wall like a green waterfall.
meanings.sent5: The leafiness of the plant added a touch of nature to the room.
